value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.excerpt: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure networking options
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with Azure networking basics to find out how Azure networking helps improve resiliency and reduce latency.

value.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to assign management access to a subscription by using Azure role-based access control.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
value.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
value.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
value.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft commercial marketplace
value.excerpt: Overview of the Microsoft commercial marketplace, including Microsoft AppSource, Azure Marketplace, offer types, and Marketplace Rewards

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: How to create App Services in the Azure portal | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create web apps using the Azure App service in the Azure portal. value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

value.title: Enabling digital transformation
value.excerpt: Digital transformation is a wave of business innovation fueled by the explosion of technology—data, applications, and devices are everywhere. The cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT) give organizations new ways to make sense of information and generate insights to transform their business. Realizing the benefits of digital transformation requires business leaders to look beyond technology to reimagine existing business models and embrace a different way of bringing together people, data, and processes to create value for customers.

value.title: Understand the evolving world of data
